permissions: User can create when they are a manager of the broker for the rule or they have update permission on the level; admins are permitted.
side_effects: Creates a driver assignment rule and enqueues a background job to cache driver assignment rule text for related job schedule shifts.
validation_notes: --rule, --level-type, and --level-id are required; level must be one of the valid types and present; broker is derived from the level and must match the level broker; rule must be present.

flags.name: --level-type
flags.description: Level type (Broker, JobScheduleShift, Project, JobProductionPlan, MaterialSupplier, MaterialSite, MaterialType, Trucker, JobSite).
flags.validation: One of Broker, JobScheduleShift, Project, JobProductionPlan, MaterialSupplier, MaterialSite, MaterialType, Trucker, JobSite.
